verbs.description: As [ARG0: President Trump] [V: meets] [ARG1: with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: this week] , some critics hope he will bring up human rights — and fear the president might not require reforms as a part of any denuclearization agreement .
